alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Jefferson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:22PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark and northwestern Jefferson Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 221 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles east of Deer Lodge to 9 miles north of Basin. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Helena, East Helena, Austin, Wickes, Rimini and Spring Meadow Lake State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 188 and 196. Highway 12 between mile markers 28 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is possible with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
